a.style: font-family:'Playfair Display', Georgia, 'Times New Roman', 'Liberation Serif', serif

text.tspan: A higher Gini index represents higher inequality.
Note: Estimates are based on household survey data of either incomes or consumption. All countries for which comparable surveys within five years
of each reference year were available are shown.
Data source: Povcal (2018); The Chartbook of Economic Inequality (2017); Kandbur et al. (2017) Table 1.B
